author: Mariella Moon
title: Uber's 1-800 number now also takes Eats delivery orders
description: Uber is giving people the ability to order Eats deliveries without having to use the app. Its experimental 1-833-USE-UBER number can now also take Eats orders in order to serve more people who have to stay at home due to the coronavirus pandemic. Uber expande…
